Boost.SqlCli Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
boost::sql_cli::columnProvides a description for one column in a result set
boost::sql_cli::connectionRepresents a connection to a database of a specific backend type. Different connection instances may be used in different threads without explicit synchronization
boost::sql_cli::errorException class that represents a generic SqlCli error
boost::sql_cli::fieldRepresents a field in a row of a statement's result set
boost::sql_cli::null_dataException class that represents a generic SqlCli error. Represents null values in context where they should not be ignored. This may be thrown when retrieving a null value in an object that is not suitable to represent it (i.e. it is neither a boost::optional<> nor a sql_cli::null_value<>)
boost::sql_cli::null_value< ValueT >Represents a typed null value. It is typically used for input parameters that are always null
boost::sql_cli::result_setRepresents the results of a query that returns data and provides means to iterate over both the data and a description of its structure
boost::sql_cli::rowAllows iteration over the fields in a result set's row
boost::sql_cli::statementAllows the execution of queries against the database
Generated on Mon Apr 23 18:12:04 2007 for Boost.SqlCli by  1.5.2
